items.question: Can we import existing sections from our design system?
items.answer: Yes. MosaicFlow ingests Figma tokens, JSON schema from your headless CMS, or raw HTML blocks. Drag them into the grid and assign motion presets on launch.

items.question: How does the mosaic shuffle work?
items.answer: You can define weightings for each tile, constrain spans on mobile, and set the cadence for reshuffling. Prefer static? Toggle it off per page in the editor.

items.question: Is the platform accessible and performant?
items.answer: We ship semantic markup, keyboard-friendly interactions, and optimized media by default. Run Lighthouse tests right inside MosaicFlow before publishing.

items.question: Do you support enterprise security requirements?
items.answer: SAML SSO, SCIM provisioning, audit trails, and regional hosting are included in Enterprise plans. Our team runs SOC 2 Type II assessments annually.
